meanings.definition: A term of endearment used to address someone affectionately.
meanings.sent1: Hey dearie, how was your day?
meanings.sent2: She is my dearie and I love her very much.
meanings.sent3: The little dearie always brightens up the room with her smile.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness makes her a dearie to everyone she meets.
meanings.sent5: I will always cherish the memories we made together, my dearie.

meanings.sent1: My dearie always knows how to make me feel better.
meanings.sent2: He is my dearie, and I can't imagine life without him.
meanings.sent3: I can't wait to surprise my dearie with a special gift.
meanings.sent4: She is the dearie of our family, bringing us all together.
meanings.sent5: His dearie nature warms the hearts of everyone around him.

meanings.sent1: The little dearie giggled with joy as she played.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's playful antics made him a dearie to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The dearie of the group always has a smile on her face.
meanings.sent4: His dearie personality shines through in everything he does.
meanings.sent5: The dearie child's laughter filled the room with happiness.
